name: Nocturne of Posts
description:
Nocturne of Posts or How I Learned to Have a Nice Time Online is an internet-based visual novel about the existential experience of trying to have a nice time online. Comedy and horrors await as you navigate forum conversations and news posts in an impossible effort to not find yourself “mad online”.

Programming/Design: Katie Fisher

Producer/Design/Writing: Raven Mulvany

Art/Design: Matt Jones
